title: Markhams faithfull farrier wherein the depth of his skill is layd open in all those principall and approued secrets of horsemanship, which the author neuer published, but hath kept in his brest, and hath beene the glory of his practise.
author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637.
publicationStmtPublisher: By T.C. for Michael Sparke, dwelling in Greene Arbor, and are to be sold by Rich. Royston, at his shop in I[...] Lane,
